title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell
description: When attempting to export data in a table that is located inside a grid cell, an exception is being thrown.
OB: When attempting to export data in a table inside a grid cell, an exception is being thrown.
EB: When exporting data in a table inside a grid cell, the data should be successfully exported without any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the grid cell containing the table.
2. Attempt to export the data in the table.
3. Observe the exception that is thrown during the export process.
